SEARCH
Package src.game.map

Class CityNode

java.lang.Object
src.game.map.CityNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CityNode extends Object implements Serializable
A class to represent a CityNode in a Network and a city in a Game can be serialized for game saving
Author:
devinlinux
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • fread

      public static List<CityNode> fread(String path)
      Library (static) method to read in a List of CityNodes from a file, the format should be as follows: # indicates a comment, everything right of this will be ignored name::id::letter::good # the good should be a string that represents the Good that it should produce the good should be one of the Goods defined in the Good enum
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file where the CityNodes are stored
      Returns:
      a List of the CityNodes found in path

    • fwrite

      public static void fwrite(String path, List<CityNode> nodes)
      Library (static) method to write a List of PathNodes to a file
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to write to
      nodes - the CityNodes to write to the file
